result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kenta D Tittle

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Kenta D Tittle.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt. 
Statements by defense counsel that defendant has a pending case set for plea/sentencing hearing in Branch 11. Court will allow this case to be transferred to Branch 11. Case adjourned for global resolution in Branch 11.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kenta D Tittle appeared by video means with Attorney.
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case heard by ZOOM.
Case in court for status conference. 
State advised the Court they have complied with the Victims' Rights Law.
Defense counsel informed the Court that the defendant has a pending federal case as well as a pending felony matter (22CF988) in Branch 11.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 15.
  Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for a Status Conference.
Discussion held off the record.  Defense advises the court defendant has indited on a felony matter and need time to determine the status of that case.
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 19.  Parties advised /this hearing will be be held streamed Live through dacast- via Zoom.
  Status conference scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a DPA hearing. Defense counsel informed the Court that the DPA offer was no longer an option due to the defendant being federally indicted. 
Court ordered matter adjourned for a status conference. Case remained calendared in branch 19. 
Status conference scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kenta D Tittle appeared by video means with Attorney.  On motion of the state, court ordered count 2 dismissed.  Case adjourned to branch 19.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.

Defendant Kenta D Tittle in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Defendant Kenta D Tittle in custody.  Katherine Seelow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Kenta D Tittle appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.  This hearing will be streamed Live through DACAST:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
